reviewText: If you are a fan of Dwight Yoakam. This is a must have. You will see him like you have never seen him before. (and probably never will again) Have to watch it to see what I mean, but once you see it you will know exactly what I mean. Your Yoakam collection is for sure not complete with out this one.

The story is standard. A young woman married to a rich man seduces her stepson to kill his father. But what set this apart with other similar movies is Pamela Gidley. She is sexy and beautiful. Please release the DVD.
